Fixed refresh problem where the subviews of lists, forms, trees and other views would not be resized (or relaid out) after the objects they are representing changed.

When the ClassAbout dictates a restriction on a class the views will now not show the menu options.
Action method value paramaters where all being rendered as text fields, even logicals.  The Builder now uses the view factory to create the most suitable view for each value type.

Restructured test case, test object factory, and documentors:-  - to detail what class and method is being tested  - to get the documentor directly  - to tell the documentor that each test has started and finished These all allow tests to be documented per individual methods, per class, or for an entire suite.
Adapted the class options so they also use the action dialog specificatio for multiple parameter static methods.  Now the class icon will show multi-parameter methods.

Completely refactored the mouse event handling, redefining dragging within a view, content dragging, and moving views.  Events over borders are now changing the cursor properly, and mousing is more accurate.  Now the start of a drag action does not occur until the mouse has moved three pixels vertically or horizontally, which makes it easier to perform the click gestures without accidentally starting a drag.

Added mechanism to allow null parameters to be specified.  As this is done as part of the process of finding a method the parameter type must be specified.  To create a null parameter use the createNullParameter methods in AcceptanceTestCase.

Modfied the error dialog so that the message is displayed within a scrollable window allowing all text to be more easily seen.

Reorganised the draw...Rectangle methods.  Removed those that only location/size objects.  Added in methods to draw a rectangle around a view, and to draw a backgound for a view.
Fixed the sizing of rectangles that are being drawn.
Fixed the drawing of the "object border", specifically the positioning of the text, and rectangle.
Fixed all borders by creating a new offset canvas for the borders contained view.  This fixes the bad placement of content within the borders.
Updated rectangle drawing.  Moved access to configuration details.
Increased the default width of TextFields.
Updated accessing of configuration properties.
*** empty log message ***
Updated rectangle drawing.

Fixed bug where when a subview specification didn't create a view for an element within a collection, then the adding of the (non-existing) view would fail.  Now if there is no view, then it is not added.
Added some basic colours.
ObjectContent now gets class method if the view contain null as it object reference.  This means that empty fields get class options.
Fixed the one to one field so that the remove option is only shown when the view has an object, i.e. it is not shown when it is an EmptyField.
Added explicit "active" colour.

Moved the sizing and startup of the Frame to the SkylarkViewer.  This ensures that the insets of the frame are known before the viewer tries to add anything to the root view.  Previously this caused the views to be placed under the window's title bar.
Updated logging.
*** empty log message ***
Fixed thrown exception when dropping a none object onto an object view.
Started adding in object methods for collections.
*** empty log message ***
Allowing tree browser to be used for viewing instance collections.
Backed out caching as the information is not always available at startup.
*** empty log message ***
Added a version field to both NakedObject and NakedCollection.
Added a flag to the Action and ActionPeer classes, to allow the framework by find out where programmer wants the method be executed.
Added a version field to both NakedObject and NakedCollection.
Added a flag to the Action and ActionPeer classes, to allow the framework by find out where programmer wants the method be executed.
Updated the distribution framework to pass over the resolved flag and version number.
*** empty log message ***
*** empty log message ***
*** empty log message ***

Updated core distribution to pass across exception that are thrown within an excecuting action method.  The exception's fields are extracted and passed over the distribution layer as an ExceptionData object.
Removed the method from NakedObjectManager I/F for creating an Error object, this is now down directly through the constructor.
Tidied up the error view to better show the exception.
Refactored help manager.
Allowed MemberIdentifier to represent a class (without a method).
Created a simple HelpManager to read help from a text file marked with class and method names.
Modified the help view to use the TextContent to organise the display of the text.
Moved the text content classes to their own package.
*** empty log message ***

Moved the setting of the resovled flag in an object to before the call to the object store.  This ensures that any recursive resolving will not attempt to resovlve the same object in an infinite loop.
Skipping lines starting with a hash (#)
PojoAdapter now ensures that any access that requires a resolved object will now force the resolving of its object before the request is forwarded to the reflection layer.
Added a method to set the comma flag, allowing the appending of the first item with a separating comma.
Refactored, and added, tests to check resolving issues.
Explicitly throwing exceptions rather than using Asserts to distinguish the reason for assert method failure.
Added OM reset to setup, and resolve to getTestClass
*** empty log message ***
Made Text an interface, and created AwtText as the main implementation, getting details from underlying AWT.
*** empty log message ***
Made Text an interface, and created AwtText as the main implementation, getting details from underlying AWT.
Fixed missing line spacing and line height properties.
Added title to show the class name
Added append methods for all the primitive types
Removed unused method isSameAs
Added view examples
Reorganised the getting of icon names and images into common superclasses.  Altered getIconPicture to get hold of a class image for class objects.
*** empty log message ***
*** empty log message ***
The ImagaFactory can now load up images for objects and classes.
Renamed the method resolveEagerly to resolveLazily as that what it is really suppose to do.
*** empty log message ***
Refactored the tree view to enable changes to be made.  Also moved the tree and table views to their own packages.
Fixed problem where the help manager was passing back a default name, when the framework already had a better one.
Removed unused method isSameAs
Extended object border to accomodate the transient marker.
Fixed bug in DebugCanvas that caused a Null pointer exception.
Increased the width of the resize border to five pixels.
Adjusted the placement of the central line dividing the two panes in the tree browser, and the placement of the right hand pane, both of which were too far to the right.
Completed the initial refactoring of the tree browser.
Added some logging
Created a scroll border example
Added the drawing of boundaries for each view contained with the testing workspace.
*** empty log message ***
Adjusted the baseline so that draw text is drawn on the baseline, and not one pixel above it.
Reinstated the redrawing after a movement of the mouse.  So changes to to screen, such as showing the resize outline, are shown as the mouse moves.
In the constructor of the internal drag now take into consideration the padding added by a views containing decorators.
*** empty log message ***

In the AbstractBorder methods lick firstClick and mouseMoved where passing on control to thier content even though the mouse was still within the border.  This caused the content to do things that they shouldn't, e.g. clicking outside a scroll border could move the scrollbar.  No these methods return immediately if the mouse is inside the border.
Created an empty border; does no drawing.
Fixed problems with resize border where the border could not be activated when moving the mouse from right to left.
Fixed offset scrolling.  Now the thumb is always aligned with the mouse.
Altered the drawing of the tree browser frame so that the resize border appears over the centre line.
Started updating TextField.
Added examples for ResizeBorder, compound borders, and TextField.
*** empty log message ***
Tidied up properties. Added examples of setting background colours for windows of specific types.
Changed status message for action to properly show what type of object will be returned when invoked.
Refactored resize border into separate classes for tree browser and text fields.  Can now specify the width of the border, which sides can be used to resize, and how the border is drawn.
*** empty log message ***
Pushed responsibilty for drawing the border between the two panels in to the tree browser to the resize border.
Caching the backgound colors and line heights in Style.  Allowing background colour by specifcaction and name.
*** empty log message ***
Refactored resize border into separate classes for tree browser and text fields.  Can now specify the width of the border, which sides can be used to resize, and how the border is drawn.
Fixed bug I added which stop limiting scrolling past the maximum.
Renamed drawBackground to clearBackground
Fixed problem in Transient OS where the title index was holding the adapter rather than the OID.

Fixed bugs in persistence: 1) where abortTransaction() on LocalObjectManager was calling the abort in the OS, when no start transaction or updates had occured; 2) during the commit phase an exception thrown by the OS didn't cause an abort on the OS.
Changed the default window and application background colours so that they were distinct.
Invalidating the layout of all subviews on the root view, rather than just the root view itself.  Trying to get the views to be laid out properly after a resizing of the application frame.
Fixed bug in status message where the name of an option was only being displayed if it was changed by the Hint.  Now picking up the name, which will have been modified by the hint if necessary.
*** empty log message ***
Refactored makePersistent, and modified it so it will not try and persist objects that are suppose to be persistent (marked us Persistable.TRANSIENT).
During post install of the Fixtures (in JavaFixtureBuilder) any thrown exception was being ignored.  Now throwing on the exception after aborting the transaction.
Implemented the isEmpty method, which was required by the tree browser veiwer.
*** empty log message ***

Replaced the existing tree browser specification so that it displayed only collection elements and only objects with collectios can be opened.  Moved the existing browser (which creates a tree showing all objects and collection, but not values) to a new class called FullTreeBrowserSpecification.
*** empty log message ***
Improved the redrawing of the viewer.
Split text field into two types - multi line and single line.  Single line fields can be scroll left/right.
Removed save from BOContainer - use objectChanged instead
Changed objects were not being saved at the end of install fixtures.
Fixed bug where object data was not being set up unless object was unresolved.
Created a criteria to do basic object pattern matching
*** empty log message ***
Redefined 'Exploration Mode', and set up exploration base class to set application to exploration mode when starting.
Fixed failing tests of XAT framework
Now not adding one-to-many field when there is not both a add and remove method.
Updated getBoolean so that it fails if an enexpected value is specified - other than yes/no, true/false, on/off.
Use of ConfigurationFactory has been deprecated.  Should now use NakedObjects.getConfiguration().
NakedClass will now prevent the creation of an instance of an abstract class.
Added saveChanges before the ending of a transaction.
Temporarily stopped the clearing of the adapter cache and the loaded object - to prevent problems in TOS.
Converted startup exception to a runtime exception
Added the ability to set the verison number for NakedObjects
Added change to Datahelper requested by Fergal.  Sets the resolved flag of the NO if the data passed acrossed was for a resolved object.

Changed the structure of exploration mode.  Now the  viewer knows whenit is running in explortation mode, and the user can control whether to show exploration options via the configuration file, or via the Ctrl modifier when bringing up the options.
Fixed error after invalid drop.
Fixed problem where tree could not be closed once opened.
Fixed problem where invalid field was not cleared when restored to it original valid value.
Fixed the mislabeling of treenodes for collection.  The field name is now being displayed, rather than the name of the type of elements.
*** empty log message ***
Enhanced logging to help track down pojo/nakedobject/oid problems
Reverted to earlier version - where changes are not logged before commiting.
*** empty log message ***
Now ignoring drops on EmptyFields of the wrong type - was causing a ClassCastException.
Fixed drag start so you drag tree nodes from a tree.
Added background to Error view
*** empty log message ***
Reorganised SkylarlkViewer so the update notifer can be injected into it.  This is needed when running in C/S mode as updates need to come across the wire and the views need to be updated.
When a business objet wants to resolve an object the business object container need only resolve it if the object is persistent.
Pushed reset responsibility from LocalObjectManager to the ObjectStore i/f.
*** empty log message ***
Reorganised SkylarlkViewer so the update notifer can be injected into it.  This is needed when running in C/S mode as updates need to come across the wire and the views need to be updated.
update() now adds changed object to a DirtyObjectSet allowing views to be refreshed where objects have changed.
*** empty log message ***
Converted OS exception into a runtime exception.
Simplified TOS so that it maintains the adapters throughout its life.  Created a new OS (from the existing TOS) that will store object data and recreate objects after a reset.
Pushed reset responsibility from LocalObjectManager to the ObjectStore i/f.
*** empty log message ***
Pushed reset responsibility from LocalObjectManager to the ObjectStore i/f.
Completed the set up of the distribution system so that updates from the server not only set up the replicas on the client, but also can notify view that have changed.
*** empty log message ***
*** empty log message ***
Moved the adding of the object to the dirty set until after the iteration through the fields of the object in the DataHelper.
Datahelper now passes on the changes to object to the dirty object set, allowing the viewer to refresh views that have changed.
*** empty log message ***

Combined Viewer and ViewerAssistant into one class, allowing a simpler setup, and use of the viewing mechanism.  Viewer is now go-between between the underlying Java UI (Awt) and the viewing mechanism.
Pushed the assignment of listeners into a non-constructor method so that events do not get dealt with until all components are set up.
Modifying the scroll border to allow it to be offset from the top and left; to allow space for synchronized headers.
*** empty log message ***
Extended deveopment build to include the standalone-client/server projects.

Converted distribution build template to generate a new version number only if the source files have changed; allows all types of builds to be created with the exact same version as long as the source remains unchanged.
Extended the Naked Objects repository to hold the reflection and reflector factories.
Split the 'by thread' repository into two parts allowing the subclass to define which set of values to use.
Removed the ConfigurationClass.  All configurations are now accessed via the NakedObjects repository.
Renamed ClientDistribution.getObject to resolveImmediately to better reflect it purpose.
Extended the Naked Objects repository to hold the reflection and reflector factories.
Fix exception in debug listing of TOS.
During commit of a Transaction the created objects are added to, and the deleted objects are removed from,  the loaded objects.
The AboutNakedObjects class can now log version details to the log internally. This simplifies the setup process of the various clients.
Created a simple shutdown listener.
Improved error reporting in Logs
Create a panel border from PlainBackground, which has now been removed.  The PanelBorder class extends the LineBorder and hence provides a line bordered panel of a given colour.
TextView no longer has its own background (it's transparent).
The scroll border was not adjusting the mouse and dragging locations when calling the decorated views.
Created a panel border from PlainBackground, which has now been removed.  The PanelBorder class extends the LineBorder and hence provides a line bordered panel of a given colour.
*** empty log message ***

Split the XML distribution project into three.  The original command objects are now part of a common package (no-distribution-common), along with common client code. XML communication specific classes are still in the original project (no-distribution-xml), and a new distribution implementation - allowing client and server to be run in a single VM are in a new project (no-distribution-pipe).
*** empty log message ***
Improved the logging of the distributed calls.
Improved the logging of the calls to PojoAdapted that change the underlying business object.
Added a helper class to log exceptions to a central server.
Added an append to ToString that  limits the size of the value.
*** empty log message ***

Improved trapping and reporting of exceptions so that all exceptions get logged to log file.  Additionally all aborting of transactions are separately wrapped so failures during the abort itself do not hide the original exception.
*** empty log message ***
Fixed the double-clicking on class icons so it only opens up the finder or retrieves all instances when in exploration mode.
*** empty log message ***
Updated project for eclipse usage
Replaced classes with standard 'bin'
Replaced classes with standard 'bin'
Renamed memento project

The distribution data factory now deals with cyclical transient graphs.  Each data object is now created without its fields, and added to a map.  Any repeated attempt to reference the same object result in the same data object being used.  This required the content of the object to set up later, hence the a change to the ObjectData interface.

First update with modifications to use true prepared statements (value = ?). Some further attention is probably needed to handle specific types in JdbcGeneralValueMapper#valueAsDBString(...). At the moment, I use instanceof clauses to get to the actual underlying data object. This is clumsy, as every class needs to be handled specifically. There should be a mechanism similar to that which sets the mapper type field ("INT", "FLOAT", etc). Implemented: INSERT, UPDATE. Still need to confirm: WHERE clauses and DELETE Untested: When a transaction is aborted.
Extended use of prepared values array to WHERE clauses of INSERT and UPDATE. All values should now be passed in via "?" in SQL string.
Re-enabled lazy load testing - it turns out that the framework was automatically resolving uninitialised field when the getText() method was called. Test now checks "text" value directly.

ISIS-268: Fixed tests to run with-out errors.  - Added @FixMethodOrder(MethodSorters.NAME_ASCENDING) annotation to force tests to run in alphabetical order  - Tests need to run in a specific order to test full life-cycle of nothing, create, test - with the database being closed and re-opened between tests.  - added @BeforeClass on deleteHsqlDbFiles to remove hsqldb files before test suite (clears all residual database files)

ISIS-268: Fixed tests to run with-out errors.  - Added @FixMethodOrder(MethodSorters.NAME_ASCENDING) annotation to force tests to run in alphabetical order  - Tests need to run in a specific order to test full life-cycle of nothing, create, test - with the database being closed and re-opened between tests.  - added @BeforeClass on deleteHsqlDbFiles to remove hsqldb files before test suite (clears all residual database files) - added JdbcImageValueMapper to handle images as a test of blob support.
